description: This Kotlin source file defines a RecyclerView adapter (ReviewsAdapter) for displaying user reviews in an Android application. It manages the presentation and interaction with review items, including editing and deleting reviews.

classes.name: ReviewsAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of reviews with edit and delete options.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: DiffUtil.ItemCallback implementation for optimizing list updates.

methods.name: VH
methods.description: ViewHolder for review items, holding references to views.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the review item layout and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds review data to the ViewHolder's views and sets up click listeners.

methods.name: Diff.areItemsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if two reviews are the same based on their IDs.

methods.name: Diff.areContentsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if two reviews have the same content.
